Name: Net Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

Name: Dive Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3.5× when underwater, fishing, or surfing

Name: Nest Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon, and drops steadily to 1× at level 30.

Name: Repeat Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for previously-caught Pokémon

Name: Timer Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×

Name: Luxury Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness

Name: Premier Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon

Name: Dusk Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.5× at night and in caves

Name: Heal Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon are immediately healed

Name: Quick Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn

Name: Cherish Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon

Name: Dream Ball
Detail: Catches Pokémon found in the Dream World.

Name: Beast Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon
